senselogic.sitevision.api.i18n

Interface CurrencyFactory


  • @Requireable(value="CurrencyFactory")
public interface CurrencyFactory
    Factory for creating Currency instances.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getCurrencyFactory(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 6.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Currency fromCurrencyCode(String aCurrencyCode)
      Gets the Currency instance for a given ISO 4217 Currency Code.
      Currency fromLocale(Locale aLocale)
      Gets the Currency instance for a given locale.

    • Method Detail

      • fromLocale

        Currency fromLocale(Locale aLocale)
        Gets the Currency instance for a given locale.

        Important Country Note! A Locale without a country can never have a Currency! This method will always return null for such Locale.

        Tip! LocaleUtil.resolveCountryLocale(Locale) might be helpful in order to compensate for language-only locales.

        This method is conceptually equivalent with the java.util.Currency.getInstance(Locale) method.

        Parameters:
        aLocale - the Locale
        Returns:
        the Currency for aLocale, or null if aLocale is null or no Currency can be determined for aLocale
        See Also:
        LocaleUtil.resolveCountryLocale(Locale)

      • fromCurrencyCode

        Currency fromCurrencyCode(String aCurrencyCode)
        Gets the Currency instance for a given ISO 4217 Currency Code.

        Currency codes are specified with a three-letter alphabetic code specified by ISO 4217

        Common currencies
        Currency name Currency code
        US Dollar USD
        Euro EUR
        Brittish Pound GBP
        Swedish Krona SEK
        Norwegian Krone NOK

        This method is conceptually equivalent with the java.util.Currency.getInstance(String) method.

        Parameters:
        aCurrencyCode - a ISO 4217 currency code
        Returns:
        a Currency for aCurrencyCode, or null if aCurrencyCode is null or invalid

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
